meanings.definition: A person or company that designs or supplies costumes for theatrical productions.
meanings.sent1: The costumiers worked tirelessly to create unique outfits for the play.
meanings.sent2: The local theater hired costumiers to design costumes for their upcoming show.
meanings.sent3: The costumiers decided to have a costume party of their own after a long day of work.
meanings.sent4: The costumiers' creativity knew no bounds as they transformed actors into characters.
meanings.sent5: The costumiers' attention to detail made the costumes truly stand out on stage.

meanings.definition: The profession or business of creating or providing costumes for performances.
meanings.sent1: Costumiers play a crucial role in the success of any theatrical production.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in costumiers after studying fashion design.
meanings.sent3: The costumiers' shop was always bustling with actors trying on different outfits.
meanings.sent4: In the world of costumiers, creativity and practicality go hand in hand.
meanings.sent5: The costumiers' dedication to their craft was evident in every costume they made.
